channel.title: Comments on: Episode #172: Life After Silicon Valley

item.title: By: PositiveEV
item.dc:creator: PositiveEV
item.description: i think as organizations build platforms that take advantage of the blockchain it will become clear that they should invest in hardware to assist in keeping costs of accessing the ledger. I.e. they put their money where their mouth is and assist in making transactions cheap.
item.content:encoded: i think as organizations build platforms that take advantage of the blockchain it will become clear that they should invest in hardware to assist in keeping costs of accessing the ledger. I.e. they put their money where their mouth is and assist in making transactions cheap.
